DOC.brief_summary: CDX-301 protein stimulate growth bone marrow stem cell certain immune cell . This study test CDX-301 healthy volunteer monitor safety biological response approximately one month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate CDX-301 ( rhuFlt3L ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A total seven cohort healthy volunteer plan dos CDX-301 ( rhuFlt3L ) range 1 75 μg/kg dose duration 5 10 day . Volunteers admit inpatient unit Treatment Period . Blood sample collect periodically assess effect CDX-301 . Volunteers follow safety 28 day follow last dose . Any volunteer develops anti-CDX-301 antibody follow monthly antibody response limit detection . In general , total duration study approximately 33-38 day .
DOC.criteria: Among criterion , volunteer must meet following condition eligible study : 1 . Ages 18 55 2 . Body Weight ≤ 120 kg 3 . Generally good health without significant medical condition 4 . Willing use effective method contraception 5 . Abstinence alcohol 72 hour prior study drug administration throughout study 6 . Negative screen test HIV , hepatitis B , hepatitis C 7 . Provide write informed consent Among criterion , volunteer meet follow condition NOT eligible study : 1 . Drug alcohol abuse within 12 month 2 . Positive drug screen 3 . Receipt certain type experimental drug treatment , certain medication 4 . Use systemic immunosuppressive agent ( exclude topical steroid ) within 12 month 5 . History certain disease include syphilis , herpes zoster , primary secondary immunodeficiency 6 . Diagnosis family history significant autoimmunity ( ex : type I diabetes , multiple sclerosis , rheumatoid arthritis , scleroderma ) 7 . Any history cancer , exclude adequately treat cured basal squamous cell carcinoma skin , cervical carcinoma situ within 2 year 8 . History asthma require use inhale oral medication within 5 year 9 . Herpes zoster within 3 month 10 . Donation blood within 8 week , donation plasma within 2 week
